item.description:
I did the 20 mile Walk for Hunger last weekend at Geoff and Joy's suggestion, and when I looked it up on the map I found we did the first few miles already, down Beacon St. That's why this one is 'Part 2' when there wasn't actually a Part 1.

We'll start off at Cleveland Circle, walk around the Reservoir (Greg just did this recently, but I couldn't make it), then walk up Beacon St into Newton, down Walnut St, then up Centre St back to Newton Centre. There's a D line stop right at Newton Centre to get you back into Boston.

Dinner afterwards for those who want to. If I'm up to it I might walk back to Cleveland Circle after dinner. It's only 2 T stops away and I feel that should be walkable to save the waiting and the $1.70. :)

Here's the map.

I'll hang around for the Yes's, but if you're a Maybe make sure you get there on time or contact me so we'll wait.

Doug
item.how_to_find_us: See my pic, and will email my cell # to RSVPs
item.name: Brighton to Newton - following the Walk for Hunger trail
